mapper.select: select count(member_id) AS CNT from taxi_share_join where taxi_share_id = #{param1} group by taxi_share_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TAXI_SHARE_JOIN ( TAXI_SHARE_ID, MEMBER_ID ) VALUES (#{taxiShareId}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select count(*) from taxi_share_join where taxi_share_id = #{taxiShareId} and member_id = #{memberId}
select member_id as "memberId", taxi_share_id as "taxi_share_id" from taxi_share_join where taxi_share_id = #{param1}
SELECT nvl(SUM(CASE WHEN state IN ('CHARGE', 'PAY') THEN count WHEN state IN ('CAR', 'TAXI') THEN -count ELSE 0 END),0) AS total_credit FROM member_credit WHERE member_id = #{param1}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_credit(MEMBER_CREDIT_ID, count, state, transaction_date, member_id) VALUES (member_credit_seq.NEXTVAL, #{param1}, 'TAXI', LOCALTIMESTAMP, #{param2})
mapper.select: select aa.member_id, count(aa.car_share_join_id) as cnt from (select csj.*, (select csr.pickup_date from car_share_registration csr where csr.car_share_regi_id = csj.car_share_regi_id) as pickup_date from car_share_join csj) aa where 1=1 and aa.state='탄다' and trunc(aa.pickup_date) = trunc(sysdate) group by aa.member_id

select tsj.tsj_id as "tsjId", tsj.taxi_share_id as "taxiShareId", tsj.member_id as "memberId", tsj.join_time as "joinTime", ts.pickup_location as "pickupLocation", trunc(ts.pickup_time)as "pickupDate", TO_CHAR(ts.PICKUP_TIME, 'HH24:MI') as "pickupTime", (select count(tsj_id) from taxi_share_join a where a.taxi_share_id = tsj.taxi_share_id group by taxi_share_id) as "count" from taxi_share_join tsj left join taxi_share ts on tsj.taxi_share_id = ts.taxi_share_id where 1=1 and trunc(ts.pickup_time) = trunc(sysdate) and tsj.member_id = #{param1}
